meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jon Groubert Melanie Tannenbaum Hepler Mackenzie Vogt Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7539.

td.p: Jon Groubert, a former attorney from Denver, Colorado
Melanie Tannenbaum Hepler, a fitness instructor from Newark, California
Mackenzie Vogt, a systems analyst from Point Pleasant, New Jersey (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,600)

tr.td: OTHER THINGS THAT HAPPENED IN 1776
SCI-FI MOVIES
THE MAIN VEGETABLE
(Alex: In the traditional version of the dishes we will give you.)
WORD & PHRASE ORIGINS
MORTAL MATTERS
ISLE BE SEEING YOU

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In Salzburg that summer, he composed his "Serenade No. 7" for a wedding')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In Salzburg that summer, he composed his "Serenade No. 7" for a wedding

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_5_1', 'clue_J_5_1_stuck', '(Mackenzie: What is medical examiner?)
(Alex: Be more specific.)
(Mackenzie: What is [*]?)
(Alex: That\'s it, yes. All right. You corrected yourself in time. And we have less than a minute now.)
[Originally ruled correct. Before the start of the Double Jeopardy! Round, Alex\'s "Be more specific" was judged to be incorrectly given and Mackenzie lost the $200 for giving a correct answer, though he was not penalized for giving an incorrect one.]

a coroner

Triple Stumper
')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
